titleHead: Start an appeal - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: Appeal a benefit decision
heading: Start an appeal
example: Use this service to appeal a benefit decision that you don’t agree with. For example, Personal Independence Payment (PIP), Employment and Support Allowance (ESA) or Universal Credit (UC).

whatYouNeedList.mrn: your Mandatory Reconsideration Notice (read it before you appeal)
whatYouNeedList.nin: your National Insurance number (this will be on any letter about the benefit)
whatYouNeedList.repDetails: details of anyone who’s supporting you with your appeal, such as a representative or friend or family member
